text: Ministry of Transport and Channels of Communication () is a ministry of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Charles Mwando Nsimba is the minister. The Bureau Permanent d’Enquêtes d’Accidents et Incidents d’Aviation (BPEA "Permanent office of investigations of aviation Accidents/Incidents") of the ministry investigates aviation accidents and incidents.
